content: Every time I visit, I wonder — how did you find all these creatures? {A加油}You've made so many discoveries, just like a real-life explorer from a storybook!

content: There's something special about being here with <style=PlayerName>{玩家昵称}</style> — {A抱歉}it's like we're exploring across time. Every discovery you've made, I get to be part of it now.
